sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Container, Nav, Navbar, NavDropdown, NavLink } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { logout } from '../redux/actions/userAction'; const Header = () => { const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) // Here we are getting the userInfo value from UserLogin const { userInfo } = userLogin const dispatch = useDispatch(); const logoutHandler = () => { dispatch(logout()) } return ( <> Online Shop
  cart { userInfo ? ( Profile Logout ) : (   signin ) }
) } export default Header;
